description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Math Cruncher has the player race around a grid trying to complete math problems without being eaten by the monsters and not making more than three mistakes. There are five modes: Multiples, Factors, Primes, Equality, and Inequality. The player tries to complete five stages and can post local high scores.
